passage_text: Depending on the model, Kingsdown beds come with a 10-20 year warranty. For a company of its size, Kingsdown has a fairly high number of Better Business Bureau complaints regarding warranty issues. (See mattress warranties: what you should know.

Kingsdown mattress dealers are bound to offer different prices on the company's many models, but you can expect to shell out anywhere from $800 to $4000 depending on the model type and mattress size you're after.

Kingsdown's below-average owner satisfaction is due mostly to the fact that at least 22% of owners report a loss of support and comfort due to sagging / development of body impressions occurring within the first three years – a rate similar to that of innerspring mattresses in general.
